services:
  mongodb:
    image: mongo:7.0
    container_name: business_plat_mongodb
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    environment:
      MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: admin
      MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: password123
      MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE: doeet
    volumes:
      - mongodb_data:/data/db
      - mongodb_config:/data/configdb
    networks:
      - business_plat_network
    command: mongod --auth --bind_ip_all
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "mongosh", "--eval", "db.adminCommand('ping')"]

      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s

  # MongoDB Express - Webç•Œé¢ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
  mongo-express:
    image: mongo-express:1.0.0
    container_name: business_plat_mongo_express

    ports:
      - "8081:8081"
    environment:
      ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME: admin
      ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD: password123
      ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_URL: mongodb://admin:password123@mongodb:27017/
      ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME: admin
      ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD: admin123

volumes:

// æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥æ•°æ® - å¸¦é‡è¯•æœºåˆ¶
async function batchInsert(collectionName, batch, isUpsert = false, retries = 3) {
  if (batch.length === 0) return { inserted: 0, updated: 0 };
  
  for (let attempt = 1; attempt <= retries; attempt++) {
    try {
      const collection = db.collection(collectionName);
      
      if (isUpsert) {
        let inserted = 0;
        let updated = 0;
        
        // æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒé›†åˆä½¿ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„upsertæ¡ä»¶
        for (const item of batch) {
          let filter;
          
          if (collectionName === COLLECTIONS.PARAMETERS) {
            // å‚æ•°æ•°æ®ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ component_id + parameter_key ä½œä¸ºå”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†
            filter = { component_id: item.component_id, parameter_key: item.parameter_key };
          } else if (collectionName === COLLECTIONS.PARAMETER_DEFINITIONS) {
            // å‚æ•°å®šä¹‰ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ parameter_key ä½œä¸ºå”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†
            filter = { parameter_key: item.parameter_key };
          } else if (collectionName === COLLECTIONS.FAMILIES) {
            // äº§å“æ—ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ family_id ä½œä¸ºå”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†
            filter = { family_id: item.family_id };
          } else {
            // é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µ
            filter = { _id: item._id };
          }
          
          const result = await collection.replaceOne(
            filter,
            item,
            { upsert: true }
          );
          
          if (result.upsertedCount > 0) {
            inserted++;
          } else if (result.modifiedCount > 0) {
            updated++;
          }
        }
        
        return { inserted, updated };
      } else {
        // å¯¹äºŽç»„ä»¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
        const result = await collection.insertMany(batch, { ordered: false });
        return { inserted: result.insertedCount, updated: 0 };
      }
    } catch (error) {
      if (error.code === 11000) {
        // å¤„ç†é‡å¤é”®é”™è¯¯
        const inserted = error.result ? error.result.insertedCount : 0;
        return { inserted, updated: 0 };
      } else if (attempt < retries && (error.name === 'MongoNetworkError' || error.name === 'MongoTimeoutError')) {
        console.warn(`âš ï¸  æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥å¤±è´¥ (å°è¯• ${attempt}/${retries}), ç­‰å¾…é‡è¯•...`, error.message);
        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000 * attempt)); // é€’å¢žå»¶è¿Ÿ
        continue;
      } else {
        console.error(`âŒ æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥å¤±è´¥ (${collectionName}):`, error.message);
        throw error;
      }
    }
  }
}

// æµå¼å¤„ç†CSVæ–‡ä»¶
function streamProcessCSV(filePath, processRow, collectionName, isUpsert = false) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    let batch = [];
    let totalProcessed = 0;
    let totalInserted = 0;
    let totalUpdated = 0;
    let lineCount = 0;
    
    console.log(`ðŸ“„ å¼€å§‹æµå¼å¤„ç†: ${path.basename(filePath)}`);
    
    const batchProcessor = new Transform({
      objectMode: true,
      async transform(chunk, encoding, callback) {
        try {
          lineCount++;
          
          // æ˜¾ç¤ºè¿›åº¦
          if (lineCount % 10000 === 0) {
            console.log(`   ðŸ“Š å·²å¤„ç† ${lineCount.toLocaleString()} è¡Œ...`);
          }
          
          const processedRow = processRow(chunk);
          if (processedRow) {
            batch.push(processedRow);
            
            // å½“æ‰¹æ¬¡è¾¾åˆ°æŒ‡å®šå¤§å°æ—¶ï¼Œä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“
            if (batch.length >= BATCH_SIZE) {
              const result = await batchInsert(collectionName, batch, isUpsert);
              totalInserted += result.inserted;
              totalUpdated += result.updated;
              totalProcessed += batch.length;
              
              console.log(`   ðŸ’¾ æ‰¹æ¬¡ä¿å­˜: ${result.inserted} æ’å…¥, ${result.updated} æ›´æ–° (æ€»è®¡: ${totalProcessed.toLocaleString()})`);
              batch = [];
            }
          }
          
          callback();
        } catch (error) {
          callback(error);
        }
      },
      
      async flush(callback) {
        try {
          // å¤„ç†æœ€åŽä¸€æ‰¹æ•°æ®
          if (batch.length > 0) {
            const result = await batchInsert(collectionName, batch, isUpsert);
            totalInserted += result.inserted;
            totalUpdated += result.updated;
            totalProcessed += batch.length;
            
            console.log(`   ðŸ’¾ æœ€ç»ˆæ‰¹æ¬¡: ${result.inserted} æ’å…¥, ${result.updated} æ›´æ–°`);
          }
          
          console.log(`âœ… ${path.basename(filePath)} å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ: ${totalInserted} æ’å…¥, ${totalUpdated} æ›´æ–°, æ€»è¡Œæ•°: ${lineCount.toLocaleString()}`);
          resolve({ inserted: totalInserted, updated: totalUpdated, totalLines: lineCount });
          callback();
        } catch (error) {
          callback(error);
        }
      }
    });
    
    fs.createReadStream(filePath)
      .pipe(csv())
      .pipe(batchProcessor)
      .on('error', reject);
  });
}

// å¤„ç†general.csvæ•°æ®
function processGeneralRow(row) {
  const processed = {
    component_id: row.id?.trim(),

  };
  
  // è§£æž family_path (ä»Žå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ•°ç»„æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢)
  if (processed.family_path) {
    try {
      // å¤„ç†ç±»ä¼¼ "['D-Shaped Connectors', 'D-Shaped', 'Connectors']" çš„æ ¼å¼
      processed.family_path = JSON.parse(processed.family_path.replace(/'/g, '"'));
    } catch (e) {
      // å¦‚æžœè§£æžå¤±è´¥ï¼Œä¿æŒåŽŸå§‹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
      console.warn(`æ— æ³•è§£æž family_path: ${processed.family_path}`);
    }
  }
  
  // ç§»é™¤ç©ºå€¼å­—æ®µ
  Object.keys(processed).forEach(key => {
    if (processed[key] === '' || processed[key] === undefined) {
      delete processed[key];
    }
  });
  
  // åªè¿”å›žæœ‰component_idçš„è®°å½•
  return processed.component_id ? processed : null;
}

function processMetaData(data) {

// æµå¼å¤„ç†CSVæ–‡ä»¶
async function processCSV(filePath, collectionName, processRowFn, progress) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    let batch = [];
    let processedCount = 0;
    let errorCount = 0;
    
    const stream = fs.createReadStream(filePath)
      .pipe(csv())
      .on('data', async (row) => {
        try {
          const processed = processRowFn(row);
          if (processed) {
            batch.push(processed);
            
            if (batch.length >= BATCH_SIZE) {
              stream.pause();
              const result = await batchInsert(collectionName, batch, true);
              processedCount += result.inserted + result.updated;
              progress[collectionName.split('.').pop()] = processedCount;
              saveProgress(progress);
              
              console.log(`ðŸ“Š ${collectionName}: å·²å¤„ç† ${processedCount} æ¡è®°å½•`);
              batch = [];
              stream.resume();
            }
          }
        } catch (error) {
          errorCount++;
          console.warn(`âš ï¸  å¤„ç†è¡Œæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:`, error.message);
        }
      })
      .on('end', async () => {
        try {
          if (batch.length > 0) {
            const result = await batchInsert(collectionName, batch, true);
            processedCount += result.inserted + result.updated;
          }
          
          console.log(`âœ… ${collectionName}: å®Œæˆå¤„ç† ${processedCount} æ¡è®°å½• (é”™è¯¯: ${errorCount})`);
          resolve({ processed: processedCount, errors: errorCount });
        } catch (error) {
          reject(error);
        }
      })
      .on('error', reject);
  });
}

// å¤„ç†JSONæ–‡ä»¶
async function processJSON(filePath, collectionName, processDataFn, progress) {
  try {
    const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'));
    const processed = processDataFn(data);
    
    let batch = [];
    let processedCount = 0;
    
    for (const item of processed) {
      batch.push(item);
      
      if (batch.length >= BATCH_SIZE) {
        const result = await batchInsert(collectionName, batch, true);
        processedCount += result.inserted + result.updated;
        progress[collectionName.split('.').pop()] = processedCount;
        saveProgress(progress);
        
        console.log(`ðŸ“Š ${collectionName}: å·²å¤„ç† ${processedCount} æ¡è®°å½•`);
        batch = [];
      }
    }
    
    if (batch.length > 0) {
      const result = await batchInsert(collectionName, batch, true);
      processedCount += result.inserted + result.updated;
    }
    
    console.log(`âœ… ${collectionName}: å®Œæˆå¤„ç† ${processedCount} æ¡è®°å½•`);
    return { processed: processedCount, errors: 0 };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`âŒ å¤„ç†JSONæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: ${error.message}`);
    throw error;
  }
}

async function getComponentWithParameters(componentId) {
  try {
    // 1. èŽ·å–ç»„ä»¶åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
    const component = await db.collection(COLLECTIONS.COMPONENTS).findOne({ component_id: componentId });

    // 3. èŽ·å–å‚æ•°å®šä¹‰ä¿¡æ¯
    const parameterKeys = parameters.map(p => p.parameter_key);

    // 4. åˆ›å»ºå‚æ•°å®šä¹‰æ˜ å°„

    // 6. æ ¹æ®family_pathæŸ¥æ‰¾äº§å“æ—ä¿¡æ¯
    let familyInfo = null;

  }
}

class MemoryMonitor:
    """å†…å­˜ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, max_memory_gb: float):
        self.max_memory_bytes = max_memory_gb * 1024 * 1024 * 1024
        self.process = psutil.Process()
    
    def get_memory_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–å½“å‰å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨é‡(MB)"""
        return self.process.memory_info().rss / 1024 / 1024
    
    def is_memory_available(self, required_mb: float) -> bool:
        """æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿå†…å­˜"""
        current_mb = self.get_memory_usage()
        return (current_mb + required_mb) * 1024 * 1024 < self.max_memory_bytes
    
    def get_cpu_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–CPUä½¿ç”¨çŽ‡"""
        return self.process.cpu_percent()


class DatabaseConnectionManager:
    """æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥ç®¡ç†å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, db_config: Dict[str, Any], config: ImportConfig):
        self.db_config = db_config
        self.config = config
        self.pool = None
        self._setup_connection_pool()
    
    def _setup_connection_pool(self):
        """è®¾ç½®è¿žæŽ¥æ± """
        try:
            pool_config = self.db_config.copy()
            pool_config.update({
                'pool_name': 'doeeet_import_pool',
                'pool_size': self.config.pool_size,
                'pool_reset_session': self.config.pool_reset_session,
                'autocommit': False,
                'use_unicode': True,
                'charset': 'utf8mb4'
            })
            
            self.pool = MySQLConnectionPool(**pool_config)
            logger.info(f"æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥æ± åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸï¼Œå¤§å°: {self.config.pool_size}")
            
        except Error as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥æ± å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
    
    def get_connection(self):
        """èŽ·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥"""
        return self.pool.get_connection()
    
    def test_connection(self) -> bool:
        """æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥"""
        try:
            conn = self.get_connection()
            cursor = conn.cursor()
            cursor.execute("SELECT 1")
            cursor.fetchone()
            cursor.close()
            conn.close()
            return True
        except Error as e:
            logger.error(f"æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False


class HighPerformanceCSVReader:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½CSVè¯»å–å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, file_path: str, config: ImportConfig):
        self.file_path = Path(file_path)
        self.config = config
        self.file_size = self.file_path.stat().st_size
        self.total_lines = self._count_lines()
        
    def _count_lines(self) -> int:
        """å¿«é€Ÿè®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°"""
        logger.info("æ­£åœ¨è®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°...")
        start_time = time.time()
        
        with open(self.file_path, 'rb') as f:
            lines = sum(1 for _ in f)
        
        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        logger.info(f"æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°: {lines:,}, è€—æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}ç§’")
        return lines
    
    def read_chunks(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats):
        """åˆ†å—è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶"""
        logger.info(f"å¼€å§‹è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶: {self.file_path}")
        
        try:
            with open(self.file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8', newline='') as f:
                csv_reader = csv.DictReader(f)
                
                chunk = []
                for row_num, row in enumerate(csv_reader, 1):
                    chunk.append(row)
                    
                    if len(chunk) >= self.config.csv_chunk_size:
                        # ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—æœ‰ç©ºé—´
                        while data_queue.qsize() >= self.config.queue_max_size:
                            time.sleep(0.1)
                        
                        data_queue.put(chunk.copy())
                        chunk.clear()
                        
                        # æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡
                        stats.records_processed = row_num
                        stats.bytes_read = f.tell()
                    
                    # æ¯10ä¸‡è¡Œè¾“å‡ºä¸€æ¬¡è¿›åº¦
                    if row_num % 100000 == 0:
                        progress = (row_num / self.total_lines) * 100
                        logger.info(f"è¯»å–è¿›åº¦: {row_num:,}/{self.total_lines:,} ({progress:.1f}%)")
                
                # å¤„ç†æœ€åŽä¸€å—
                if chunk:
                    data_queue.put(chunk)
                    stats.records_processed += len(chunk)
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
        finally:
            # å‘é€ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
            data_queue.put(None)
            logger.info("CSVæ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–å®Œæˆ")


class HighPerformanceDatabaseWriter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½æ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, db_manager: DatabaseConnectionManager, config: ImportConfig):
        self.db_manager = db_manager
        self.config = config
        self.insert_query = """
            INSERT INTO product_parameters (product_id, parameter_key, parameter_value)
            VALUES (%s, %s, %s)
            ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
                parameter_value = VALUES(parameter_value)
        """
    
    def write_data(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats, worker_id: int):
        """å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“"""
        logger.info(f"æ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å¯åŠ¨")
        
        conn = None
        cursor = None
        batch_buffer = []
        records_since_commit = 0
        
        try:
            conn = self.db_manager.get_connection()
            cursor = conn.cursor()
            
            while True:
                try:
                    # èŽ·å–æ•°æ®å—
                    chunk = data_queue.get(timeout=30)
                    if chunk is None:  # ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
                        break
                    
                    # å¤„ç†æ•°æ®å—
                    for row in chunk:
                        batch_buffer.append((
                            row['id'],
                            row['key'],
                            str(row.get('value', ''))
                        ))
                        
                        # è¾¾åˆ°æ‰¹é‡å¤§å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œæ’å…¥
                        if len(batch_buffer) >= self.config.db_batch_size:
                            cursor.executemany(self.insert_query, batch_buffer)
                            stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer)
                            records_since_commit += len(batch_buffer)
                            batch_buffer.clear()
                            
                            # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦æäº¤
                            if records_since_commit >= self.config.commit_frequency:
                                conn.commit()
                                records_since_commit = 0
                                logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²æäº¤ {stats.records_written:,} æ¡è®°å½•")
                    
                    data_queue.task_done()
                    
                except queue.Empty:
                    logger.warning(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} ç­‰å¾…æ•°æ®è¶…æ—¶")
                    continue
            
            # å¤„ç†å‰©ä½™æ•°æ®
            if batch_buffer:
                cursor.executemany(self.insert_query, batch_buffer)
                stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer)
                conn.commit()
                logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} æœ€ç»ˆæäº¤ {len(batch_buffer)} æ¡è®°å½•")
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            if conn:
                conn.rollback()
            raise
        
        finally:
            if cursor:
                cursor.close()
            if conn:
                conn.close()
            logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å…³é—­")


class PerformanceMonitor:
    """æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, stats: PerformanceStats, memory_monitor: MemoryMonitor, total_records: int):
        self.stats = stats
        self.memory_monitor = memory_monitor
        self.total_records = total_records
        self.last_check_time = time.time()
        self.last_records_count = 0
    
    def update_stats(self):
        """æ›´æ–°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        current_time = time.time()
        elapsed_total = current_time - self.stats.start_time.timestamp()
        elapsed_since_last = current_time - self.last_check_time
        
        # è®¡ç®—é€Ÿåº¦
        if elapsed_since_last > 0:
            records_diff = self.stats.records_written - self.last_records_count
            self.stats.current_speed = records_diff / elapsed_since_last
        
        if elapsed_total > 0:
            self.stats.avg_speed = self.stats.records_written / elapsed_total
        
        # è®¡ç®—ETA
        if self.stats.avg_speed > 0:
            remaining_records = self.total_records - self.stats.records_written
            remaining_seconds = remaining_records / self.stats.avg_speed
            self.stats.eta = datetime.now() + timedelta(seconds=remaining_seconds)
        
        # æ›´æ–°ç³»ç»Ÿèµ„æºä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å†µ
        self.stats.memory_usage_mb = self.memory_monitor.get_memory_usage()
        self.stats.cpu_usage = self.memory_monitor.get_cpu_usage()
        
        # æ›´æ–°æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹
        self.last_check_time = current_time
        self.last_records_count = self.stats.records_written
    
    def print_stats(self):
        """æ‰“å°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        self.update_stats()

class HighPerformanceDoEEETImporter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½DoEEETæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, db_config: Dict[str, Any], data_dir: str, config: ImportConfig = None):

        logger.info(f"é…ç½®: {self.config}")
    
    def create_tables(self) -> bool:
        """åˆ›å»ºå¿…è¦çš„æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨"""
        try:
            conn = self.db_manager.get_connection()
            cursor = conn.cursor()
            
            # åˆ›å»ºäº§å“å‚æ•°è¡¨
            create_table_sql = """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product_parameters (

                product_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
                parameter_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
                parameter_value TEXT,

                UNIQUE KEY unique_product_param (product_id, parameter_key),
                INDEX idx_product_id (product_id),
                INDEX idx_parameter_key (parameter_key)
            ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
            """
            
            cursor.execute(create_table_sql)
            conn.commit()
            cursor.close()
            conn.close()
            
            logger.info("æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ")
            return True
            
        except Error as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False
    
    def import_parameters(self) -> bool:
        """å¯¼å…¥å‚æ•°æ•°æ®"""
        logger.info("å¼€å§‹é«˜æ€§èƒ½å‚æ•°æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥...")
        
        # æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥
        if not self.db_manager.test_connection():
            logger.error("æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥")
            return False
        
        # åˆ›å»ºè¡¨

        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»Ÿè®¡

        csv_reader = HighPerformanceCSVReader(str(self.parameter_csv), self.config)
        total_records = csv_reader.total_lines - 1  # å‡åŽ»æ ‡é¢˜è¡Œ
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨
        monitor = PerformanceMonitor(stats, self.memory_monitor, total_records)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®é˜Ÿåˆ—
        data_queue = queue.Queue(maxsize=self.config.queue_max_size)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å™¨
        db_writer = HighPerformanceDatabaseWriter(self.db_manager, self.config)
        
        try:
            # å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± 
            with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=self.config.reader_threads + self.config.writer_threads) as executor:
                # æäº¤è¯»å–ä»»åŠ¡
                read_future = executor.submit(csv_reader.read_chunks, data_queue, stats)
                
                # æäº¤å†™å…¥ä»»åŠ¡
                write_futures = []
                for i in range(self.config.writer_threads):
                    future = executor.submit(db_writer.write_data, data_queue, stats, i)
                    write_futures.append(future)
                
                # ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦
                monitor_thread = threading.Thread(
                    target=self._monitor_progress,
                    args=(monitor, stats, total_records),
                    daemon=True
                )

                # ç­‰å¾…è¯»å–å®Œæˆ
                read_future.result()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰å†™å…¥å®Œæˆ

                    try:
                        future.result()

                        return False
            
            # æœ€ç»ˆç»Ÿè®¡
            elapsed = datetime.now() - stats.start_time
            logger.info(f"""
å¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆ!
  æ€»è®°å½•æ•°: {stats.records_written:,}
  æ€»è€—æ—¶: {elapsed}
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {stats.records_written / elapsed.total_seconds():,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’

            return True
            
        except Exception as e:

    def _monitor_progress(self, monitor: PerformanceMonitor, stats: PerformanceStats, total_records: int):

class MemoryMonitor:

    def get_memory_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–å½“å‰å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨é‡(MB)"""
        return self.process.memory_info().rss / 1024 / 1024
    
    def is_memory_available(self, required_mb: float) -> bool:
        """æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿå†…å­˜"""
        current_mb = self.get_memory_usage()
        return (current_mb + required_mb) * 1024 * 1024 < self.max_memory_bytes
    
    def get_cpu_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–CPUä½¿ç”¨çŽ‡"""
        return self.process.cpu_percent()

class HighPerformanceCSVReader:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½CSVè¯»å–å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, file_path: str, config: ImportConfig):
        self.file_path = Path(file_path)
        self.config = config
        self.file_size = self.file_path.stat().st_size
        self.total_lines = self._count_lines()
        
    def _count_lines(self) -> int:
        """å¿«é€Ÿè®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°"""
        logger.info("æ­£åœ¨è®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°...")
        start_time = time.time()
        
        with open(self.file_path, 'rb') as f:
            lines = sum(1 for _ in f)
        
        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        logger.info(f"æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°: {lines:,}, è€—æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}ç§’")
        return lines
    
    def read_chunks(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats):
        """åˆ†å—è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶"""
        logger.info(f"å¼€å§‹è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶: {self.file_path}")
        
        try:
            with open(self.file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8', newline='') as f:
                csv_reader = csv.DictReader(f)
                
                chunk = []
                for row_num, row in enumerate(csv_reader, 1):
                    chunk.append(row)
                    
                    if len(chunk) >= self.config.csv_chunk_size:
                        # ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—æœ‰ç©ºé—´
                        while data_queue.qsize() >= self.config.queue_max_size:
                            time.sleep(0.1)
                        
                        data_queue.put(chunk.copy())
                        chunk.clear()
                        
                        # æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡
                        stats.records_processed = row_num
                        stats.bytes_read = f.tell()
                    
                    # æ¯10ä¸‡è¡Œè¾“å‡ºä¸€æ¬¡è¿›åº¦
                    if row_num % 100000 == 0:
                        progress = (row_num / self.total_lines) * 100
                        logger.info(f"è¯»å–è¿›åº¦: {row_num:,}/{self.total_lines:,} ({progress:.1f}%)")
                
                # å¤„ç†æœ€åŽä¸€å—
                if chunk:
                    data_queue.put(chunk)
                    stats.records_processed += len(chunk)
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
        finally:
            # å‘é€ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
            data_queue.put(None)
            logger.info("CSVæ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–å®Œæˆ")


class HighPerformanceMongoDBWriter:

    def write_data(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats, worker_id: int):
        """å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°MongoDB"""
        logger.info(f"MongoDBå†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å¯åŠ¨")

                    # èŽ·å–æ•°æ®å—

                        break
                    
                    # å¤„ç†æ•°æ®å—
                    for row in chunk:
                        # æž„å»ºMongoDBæ–‡æ¡£
                        doc = {
                            'product_id': row['id'],

                        batch_buffer.append(operation)
                        
                        # è¾¾åˆ°æ‰¹é‡å¤§å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œå†™å…¥
                        if len(batch_buffer) >= self.config.db_batch_size:
                            try:
                                result = self.collection.bulk_write(batch_buffer, ordered=False)
                                stats.records_written += result.upserted_count + result.modified_count
                                batch_buffer.clear()
                                
                                logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å¤„ç† {stats.records_written:,} æ¡è®°å½•")
                                
                            except BulkWriteError as bwe:
                                logger.error(f"æ‰¹é‡å†™å…¥é”™è¯¯: {bwe.details}")
                                # ç»§ç»­å¤„ç†ï¼Œä¸ä¸­æ–­
                                stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer) - len(bwe.details.get('writeErrors', []))
                                batch_buffer.clear()
                    
                    data_queue.task_done()
                    
                except queue.Empty:
                    logger.warning(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} ç­‰å¾…æ•°æ®è¶…æ—¶")
                    continue
            
            # å¤„ç†å‰©ä½™æ•°æ®
            if batch_buffer:
                try:
                    result = self.collection.bulk_write(batch_buffer, ordered=False)
                    stats.records_written += result.upserted_count + result.modified_count
                    logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} æœ€ç»ˆå¤„ç† {len(batch_buffer)} æ¡è®°å½•")
                except BulkWriteError as bwe:
                    logger.error(f"æœ€ç»ˆæ‰¹é‡å†™å…¥é”™è¯¯: {bwe.details}")
                    stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer) - len(bwe.details.get('writeErrors', []))
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            raise
        
        finally:
            logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å…³é—­")


class PerformanceMonitor:
    """æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, stats: PerformanceStats, memory_monitor: MemoryMonitor, total_records: int):
        self.stats = stats
        self.memory_monitor = memory_monitor
        self.total_records = total_records
        self.last_check_time = time.time()
        self.last_records_count = 0
    
    def update_stats(self):
        """æ›´æ–°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        current_time = time.time()
        elapsed_total = current_time - self.stats.start_time.timestamp()
        elapsed_since_last = current_time - self.last_check_time
        
        # è®¡ç®—é€Ÿåº¦
        if elapsed_since_last > 0:
            records_diff = self.stats.records_written - self.last_records_count
            self.stats.current_speed = records_diff / elapsed_since_last
        
        if elapsed_total > 0:
            self.stats.avg_speed = self.stats.records_written / elapsed_total
        
        # è®¡ç®—ETA
        if self.stats.avg_speed > 0:
            remaining_records = self.total_records - self.stats.records_written
            remaining_seconds = remaining_records / self.stats.avg_speed
            self.stats.eta = datetime.now() + timedelta(seconds=remaining_seconds)
        
        # æ›´æ–°ç³»ç»Ÿèµ„æºä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å†µ
        self.stats.memory_usage_mb = self.memory_monitor.get_memory_usage()
        self.stats.cpu_usage = self.memory_monitor.get_cpu_usage()
        
        # æ›´æ–°æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹
        self.last_check_time = current_time
        self.last_records_count = self.stats.records_written
    
    def print_stats(self):
        """æ‰“å°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        self.update_stats()
        
        progress = (self.stats.records_written / self.total_records) * 100 if self.total_records > 0 else 0
        eta_str = self.stats.eta.strftime("%H:%M:%S") if self.stats.eta else "æœªçŸ¥"
        
        logger.info(f"""
æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡:
  è¿›åº¦: {self.stats.records_written:,}/{self.total_records:,} ({progress:.1f}%)
  å½“å‰é€Ÿåº¦: {self.stats.current_speed:,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {self.stats.avg_speed:,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
  é¢„è®¡å®Œæˆ: {eta_str}
  å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨: {self.stats.memory_usage_mb:.1f} MB
  CPUä½¿ç”¨: {self.stats.cpu_usage:.1f}%
        """)


class HighPerformanceMongoDBImporter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDB DoEEETæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, data_dir: str, config: ImportConfig = None):
        self.data_dir = Path(data_dir)
        self.config = config or ImportConfig()
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»„ä»¶
        self.memory_monitor = MemoryMonitor(self.config.max_memory_gb)
        self.db_manager = MongoDBConnectionManager(self.config)
        
        # æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        self.parameter_csv = self.data_dir / "parameter.csv"
        
        # éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶
        if not self.parameter_csv.exists():
            raise FileNotFoundError(f"å‚æ•°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {self.parameter_csv}")
        
        logger.info(f"é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ")
        logger.info(f"é…ç½®: {self.config}")
    
    def import_parameters(self) -> bool:
        """å¯¼å…¥å‚æ•°æ•°æ®"""
        logger.info("å¼€å§‹é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå‚æ•°æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥...")
        
        # æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥
        if not self.db_manager.test_connection():
            logger.error("MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥")
            return False
        
        # åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•
        try:
            self.db_manager.create_indexes()
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»Ÿè®¡
        stats = PerformanceStats(start_time=datetime.now())
        
        # åˆ›å»ºCSVè¯»å–å™¨
        csv_reader = HighPerformanceCSVReader(str(self.parameter_csv), self.config)
        total_records = csv_reader.total_lines - 1  # å‡åŽ»æ ‡é¢˜è¡Œ
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨
        monitor = PerformanceMonitor(stats, self.memory_monitor, total_records)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®é˜Ÿåˆ—
        data_queue = queue.Queue(maxsize=self.config.queue_max_size)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å™¨
        db_writer = HighPerformanceMongoDBWriter(self.db_manager, self.config)
        
        try:
            # å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± 
            with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=self.config.reader_threads + self.config.writer_threads) as executor:
                # æäº¤è¯»å–ä»»åŠ¡
                read_future = executor.submit(csv_reader.read_chunks, data_queue, stats)
                
                # æäº¤å†™å…¥ä»»åŠ¡
                write_futures = []
                for i in range(self.config.writer_threads):
                    future = executor.submit(db_writer.write_data, data_queue, stats, i)
                    write_futures.append(future)
                
                # ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦
                monitor_thread = threading.Thread(
                    target=self._monitor_progress,
                    args=(monitor, stats, total_records),
                    daemon=True
                )
                monitor_thread.start()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…è¯»å–å®Œæˆ
                read_future.result()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰å†™å…¥å®Œæˆ
                for future in as_completed(write_futures):
                    try:
                        future.result()
                    except Exception as e:
                        logger.error(f"å†™å…¥çº¿ç¨‹å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
                        return False
            
            # æœ€ç»ˆç»Ÿè®¡
            elapsed = datetime.now() - stats.start_time
            logger.info(f"""
MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆ!
  æ€»è®°å½•æ•°: {stats.records_written:,}
  æ€»è€—æ—¶: {elapsed}
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {stats.records_written / elapsed.total_seconds():,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
            """)
            
            return True
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å¯¼å…¥è¿‡ç¨‹å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            return False
    
    def _monitor_progress(self, monitor: PerformanceMonitor, stats: PerformanceStats, total_records: int):
        """ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦çº¿ç¨‹"""
        while stats.records_written < total_records:
            time.sleep(10)  # æ¯10ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡
            monitor.print_stats()

class MemoryMonitor:
    """å†…å­˜ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, max_memory_gb: float):
        self.max_memory_bytes = max_memory_gb * 1024 * 1024 * 1024
        self.process = psutil.Process()
    
    def get_memory_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–å½“å‰å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨é‡(MB)"""
        return self.process.memory_info().rss / 1024 / 1024
    
    def is_memory_available(self, required_mb: float) -> bool:
        """æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿå†…å­˜"""
        current_mb = self.get_memory_usage()
        return (current_mb + required_mb) * 1024 * 1024 < self.max_memory_bytes
    
    def get_cpu_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–CPUä½¿ç”¨çŽ‡"""
        return self.process.cpu_percent()


class MongoDBConnectionManager:
    """MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥ç®¡ç†å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, config: ImportConfig):
        self.config = config
        self.client = None
        self.db = None
        self.collection = None
        self._setup_connection()
    
    def _setup_connection(self):
        """è®¾ç½®MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥"""
        try:
            self.client = MongoClient(
                self.config.mongodb_uri,
                maxPoolSize=20,
                minPoolSize=5,
                maxIdleTimeMS=30000,
                waitQueueTimeoutMS=5000,
                serverSelectionTimeoutMS=5000
            )
            
            self.db = self.client[self.config.database_name]
            self.collection = self.db[self.config.collection_name]
            
            logger.info(f"MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ: {self.config.database_name}.{self.config.collection_name}")
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºMongoDBè¿žæŽ¥å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
    
    def test_connection(self) -> bool:
        """æµ‹è¯•MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥"""
        try:
            self.client.admin.command('ping')
            return True
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False
    
    def create_indexes(self):
        """åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•"""
        try:
            # åˆ›å»ºå¤åˆç´¢å¼•
            self.collection.create_index([
                ("product_id", pymongo.ASCENDING),
                ("parameter_key", pymongo.ASCENDING)
            ], unique=True, background=True)
            
            # åˆ›å»ºå•å­—æ®µç´¢å¼•
            self.collection.create_index("product_id", background=True)
            self.collection.create_index("parameter_key", background=True)
            
            logger.info("MongoDBç´¢å¼•åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ")
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºMongoDBç´¢å¼•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise


class HighPerformanceCSVReader:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½CSVè¯»å–å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, file_path: str, config: ImportConfig):
        self.file_path = Path(file_path)
        self.config = config
        self.file_size = self.file_path.stat().st_size
        self.total_lines = self._count_lines()
        
    def _count_lines(self) -> int:
        """å¿«é€Ÿè®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°"""
        logger.info("æ­£åœ¨è®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°...")
        start_time = time.time()
        
        with open(self.file_path, 'rb') as f:
            lines = sum(1 for _ in f)
        
        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        logger.info(f"æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°: {lines:,}, è€—æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}ç§’")
        return lines
    
    def read_chunks(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats):
        """åˆ†å—è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶"""
        logger.info(f"å¼€å§‹è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶: {self.file_path}")
        
        try:
            with open(self.file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8', newline='') as f:
                csv_reader = csv.DictReader(f)
                
                chunk = []
                for row_num, row in enumerate(csv_reader, 1):
                    chunk.append(row)
                    
                    if len(chunk) >= self.config.csv_chunk_size:
                        # ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—æœ‰ç©ºé—´
                        while data_queue.qsize() >= self.config.queue_max_size:
                            time.sleep(0.1)
                        
                        data_queue.put(chunk.copy())
                        chunk.clear()
                        
                        # æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡
                        stats.records_processed = row_num
                        stats.bytes_read = f.tell()
                    
                    # æ¯10ä¸‡è¡Œè¾“å‡ºä¸€æ¬¡è¿›åº¦
                    if row_num % 100000 == 0:
                        progress = (row_num / self.total_lines) * 100
                        logger.info(f"è¯»å–è¿›åº¦: {row_num:,}/{self.total_lines:,} ({progress:.1f}%)")
                
                # å¤„ç†æœ€åŽä¸€å—
                if chunk:
                    data_queue.put(chunk)
                    stats.records_processed += len(chunk)
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
        finally:
            # å‘é€ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
            data_queue.put(None)
            logger.info("CSVæ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–å®Œæˆ")


class HighPerformanceMongoDBWriter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå†™å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, db_manager: MongoDBConnectionManager, config: ImportConfig):
        self.db_manager = db_manager
        self.config = config
        self.collection = db_manager.collection
    
    def write_data(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats, worker_id: int):
        """å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°MongoDB"""
        logger.info(f"MongoDBå†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å¯åŠ¨")
        
        batch_buffer = []
        
        try:
            while True:
                try:
                    # èŽ·å–æ•°æ®å—
                    chunk = data_queue.get(timeout=30)
                    if chunk is None:  # ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
                        break
                    
                    # å¤„ç†æ•°æ®å—
                    for row in chunk:
                        # æž„å»ºMongoDBæ–‡æ¡£
                        doc = {
                            'product_id': row['id'],
                            'parameter_key': row['key'],
                            'parameter_value': str(row.get('value', '')),
                            'created_at': datetime.now(),
                            'updated_at': datetime.now()
                        }
                        
                        # ä½¿ç”¨upsertæ“ä½œ
                        operation = UpdateOne(
                            {
                                'product_id': doc['product_id'],
                                'parameter_key': doc['parameter_key']
                            },
                            {
                                '$set': doc,
                                '$setOnInsert': {'created_at': datetime.now()}
                            },
                            upsert=True
                        )
                        
                        batch_buffer.append(operation)
                        
                        # è¾¾åˆ°æ‰¹é‡å¤§å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œå†™å…¥
                        if len(batch_buffer) >= self.config.db_batch_size:
                            try:
                                result = self.collection.bulk_write(batch_buffer, ordered=False)
                                stats.records_written += result.upserted_count + result.modified_count
                                batch_buffer.clear()
                                
                                logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å¤„ç† {stats.records_written:,} æ¡è®°å½•")
                                
                            except BulkWriteError as bwe:
                                logger.error(f"æ‰¹é‡å†™å…¥é”™è¯¯: {bwe.details}")
                                # ç»§ç»­å¤„ç†ï¼Œä¸ä¸­æ–­
                                stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer) - len(bwe.details.get('writeErrors', []))
                                batch_buffer.clear()
                    
                    data_queue.task_done()
                    
                except queue.Empty:
                    logger.warning(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} ç­‰å¾…æ•°æ®è¶…æ—¶")
                    continue
            
            # å¤„ç†å‰©ä½™æ•°æ®
            if batch_buffer:
                try:
                    result = self.collection.bulk_write(batch_buffer, ordered=False)
                    stats.records_written += result.upserted_count + result.modified_count
                    logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} æœ€ç»ˆå¤„ç† {len(batch_buffer)} æ¡è®°å½•")
                except BulkWriteError as bwe:
                    logger.error(f"æœ€ç»ˆæ‰¹é‡å†™å…¥é”™è¯¯: {bwe.details}")
                    stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer) - len(bwe.details.get('writeErrors', []))
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            raise
        
        finally:
            logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å…³é—­")


class PerformanceMonitor:
    """æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, stats: PerformanceStats, memory_monitor: MemoryMonitor, total_records: int):
        self.stats = stats
        self.memory_monitor = memory_monitor
        self.total_records = total_records
        self.last_check_time = time.time()
        self.last_records_count = 0
    
    def update_stats(self):
        """æ›´æ–°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        current_time = time.time()
        elapsed_total = current_time - self.stats.start_time.timestamp()
        elapsed_since_last = current_time - self.last_check_time
        
        # è®¡ç®—é€Ÿåº¦
        if elapsed_since_last > 0:
            records_diff = self.stats.records_written - self.last_records_count
            self.stats.current_speed = records_diff / elapsed_since_last
        
        if elapsed_total > 0:
            self.stats.avg_speed = self.stats.records_written / elapsed_total
        
        # è®¡ç®—ETA
        if self.stats.avg_speed > 0:
            remaining_records = self.total_records - self.stats.records_written
            remaining_seconds = remaining_records / self.stats.avg_speed
            self.stats.eta = datetime.now() + timedelta(seconds=remaining_seconds)
        
        # æ›´æ–°ç³»ç»Ÿèµ„æºä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å†µ
        self.stats.memory_usage_mb = self.memory_monitor.get_memory_usage()
        self.stats.cpu_usage = self.memory_monitor.get_cpu_usage()
        
        # æ›´æ–°æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹
        self.last_check_time = current_time
        self.last_records_count = self.stats.records_written
    
    def print_stats(self):
        """æ‰“å°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        self.update_stats()
        
        progress = (self.stats.records_written / self.total_records) * 100 if self.total_records > 0 else 0
        eta_str = self.stats.eta.strftime("%H:%M:%S") if self.stats.eta else "æœªçŸ¥"
        
        logger.info(f"""
æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡:
  è¿›åº¦: {self.stats.records_written:,}/{self.total_records:,} ({progress:.1f}%)
  å½“å‰é€Ÿåº¦: {self.stats.current_speed:,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {self.stats.avg_speed:,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
  é¢„è®¡å®Œæˆ: {eta_str}
  å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨: {self.stats.memory_usage_mb:.1f} MB
  CPUä½¿ç”¨: {self.stats.cpu_usage:.1f}%
        """)


class HighPerformanceMongoDBImporter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDB DoEEETæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, data_dir: str, config: ImportConfig = None):
        self.data_dir = Path(data_dir)
        self.config = config or ImportConfig()
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»„ä»¶
        self.memory_monitor = MemoryMonitor(self.config.max_memory_gb)
        self.db_manager = MongoDBConnectionManager(self.config)
        
        # æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        self.parameter_csv = self.data_dir / "parameter.csv"
        
        # éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶
        if not self.parameter_csv.exists():
            raise FileNotFoundError(f"å‚æ•°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {self.parameter_csv}")
        
        logger.info(f"é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ")
        logger.info(f"é…ç½®: {self.config}")
    
    def import_parameters(self) -> bool:
        """å¯¼å…¥å‚æ•°æ•°æ®"""
        logger.info("å¼€å§‹é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå‚æ•°æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥...")
        
        # æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥
        if not self.db_manager.test_connection():
            logger.error("MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥")
            return False
        
        # åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•
        try:
            self.db_manager.create_indexes()
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»Ÿè®¡
        stats = PerformanceStats(start_time=datetime.now())
        
        # åˆ›å»ºCSVè¯»å–å™¨
        csv_reader = HighPerformanceCSVReader(str(self.parameter_csv), self.config)
        total_records = csv_reader.total_lines - 1  # å‡åŽ»æ ‡é¢˜è¡Œ
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨
        monitor = PerformanceMonitor(stats, self.memory_monitor, total_records)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®é˜Ÿåˆ—
        data_queue = queue.Queue(maxsize=self.config.queue_max_size)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å™¨
        db_writer = HighPerformanceMongoDBWriter(self.db_manager, self.config)
        
        try:
            # å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± 
            with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=self.config.reader_threads + self.config.writer_threads) as executor:
                # æäº¤è¯»å–ä»»åŠ¡
                read_future = executor.submit(csv_reader.read_chunks, data_queue, stats)
                
                # æäº¤å†™å…¥ä»»åŠ¡
                write_futures = []
                for i in range(self.config.writer_threads):
                    future = executor.submit(db_writer.write_data, data_queue, stats, i)
                    write_futures.append(future)
                
                # ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦
                monitor_thread = threading.Thread(
                    target=self._monitor_progress,
                    args=(monitor, stats, total_records),
                    daemon=True
                )
                monitor_thread.start()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…è¯»å–å®Œæˆ
                read_future.result()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰å†™å…¥å®Œæˆ
                for future in as_completed(write_futures):
                    try:
                        future.result()
                    except Exception as e:
                        logger.error(f"å†™å…¥çº¿ç¨‹å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
                        return False
            
            # æœ€ç»ˆç»Ÿè®¡
            elapsed = datetime.now() - stats.start_time
            logger.info(f"""
MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆ!
  æ€»è®°å½•æ•°: {stats.records_written:,}
  æ€»è€—æ—¶: {elapsed}
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {stats.records_written / elapsed.total_seconds():,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
            """)
            
            return True
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å¯¼å…¥è¿‡ç¨‹å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            return False
    
    def _monitor_progress(self, monitor: PerformanceMonitor, stats: PerformanceStats, total_records: int):
        """ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦çº¿ç¨‹"""
        while stats.records_written < total_records:
            time.sleep(10)  # æ¯10ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡
            monitor.print_stats()

class MemoryMonitor:
    """å†…å­˜ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, max_memory_gb: float):
        self.max_memory_bytes = max_memory_gb * 1024 * 1024 * 1024
        self.process = psutil.Process()
    
    def get_memory_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–å½“å‰å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨é‡(MB)"""
        return self.process.memory_info().rss / 1024 / 1024
    
    def is_memory_available(self, required_mb: float) -> bool:
        """æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿå†…å­˜"""
        current_mb = self.get_memory_usage()
        return (current_mb + required_mb) * 1024 * 1024 < self.max_memory_bytes
    
    def get_cpu_usage(self) -> float:
        """èŽ·å–CPUä½¿ç”¨çŽ‡"""
        return self.process.cpu_percent()


class MongoDBConnectionManager:
    """MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥ç®¡ç†å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, config: ImportConfig):
        self.config = config
        self.client = None
        self.db = None
        self.collection = None
        self._setup_connection()
    
    def _setup_connection(self):
        """è®¾ç½®MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥"""
        try:
            self.client = MongoClient(
                self.config.mongodb_uri,
                maxPoolSize=20,
                minPoolSize=5,
                maxIdleTimeMS=30000,
                waitQueueTimeoutMS=5000,
                serverSelectionTimeoutMS=5000
            )
            
            self.db = self.client[self.config.database_name]
            self.collection = self.db[self.config.collection_name]
            
            logger.info(f"MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ: {self.config.database_name}.{self.config.collection_name}")
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºMongoDBè¿žæŽ¥å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
    
    def test_connection(self) -> bool:
        """æµ‹è¯•MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥"""
        try:
            self.client.admin.command('ping')
            return True
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False
    
    def create_indexes(self):
        """åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•"""
        try:
            # åˆ›å»ºå¤åˆç´¢å¼•
            self.collection.create_index([
                ("product_id", pymongo.ASCENDING),
                ("parameter_key", pymongo.ASCENDING)
            ], unique=True, background=True)
            
            # åˆ›å»ºå•å­—æ®µç´¢å¼•
            self.collection.create_index("product_id", background=True)
            self.collection.create_index("parameter_key", background=True)
            
            logger.info("MongoDBç´¢å¼•åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ")
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºMongoDBç´¢å¼•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise


class HighPerformanceCSVReader:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½CSVè¯»å–å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, file_path: str, config: ImportConfig):
        self.file_path = Path(file_path)
        self.config = config
        self.file_size = self.file_path.stat().st_size
        self.total_lines = self._count_lines()
        
    def _count_lines(self) -> int:
        """å¿«é€Ÿè®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°"""
        logger.info("æ­£åœ¨è®¡ç®—æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°...")
        start_time = time.time()
        
        with open(self.file_path, 'rb') as f:
            lines = sum(1 for _ in f)
        
        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        logger.info(f"æ–‡ä»¶è¡Œæ•°: {lines:,}, è€—æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}ç§’")
        return lines
    
    def read_chunks(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats):
        """åˆ†å—è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶"""
        logger.info(f"å¼€å§‹è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶: {self.file_path}")
        
        try:
            with open(self.file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8', newline='') as f:
                csv_reader = csv.DictReader(f)
                
                chunk = []
                for row_num, row in enumerate(csv_reader, 1):
                    chunk.append(row)
                    
                    if len(chunk) >= self.config.csv_chunk_size:
                        # ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—æœ‰ç©ºé—´
                        while data_queue.qsize() >= self.config.queue_max_size:
                            time.sleep(0.1)
                        
                        data_queue.put(chunk.copy())
                        chunk.clear()
                        
                        # æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡
                        stats.records_processed = row_num
                        stats.bytes_read = f.tell()
                    
                    # æ¯10ä¸‡è¡Œè¾“å‡ºä¸€æ¬¡è¿›åº¦
                    if row_num % 100000 == 0:
                        progress = (row_num / self.total_lines) * 100
                        logger.info(f"è¯»å–è¿›åº¦: {row_num:,}/{self.total_lines:,} ({progress:.1f}%)")
                
                # å¤„ç†æœ€åŽä¸€å—
                if chunk:
                    data_queue.put(chunk)
                    stats.records_processed += len(chunk)
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            raise
        finally:
            # å‘é€ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
            data_queue.put(None)
            logger.info("CSVæ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–å®Œæˆ")


class HighPerformanceMongoDBWriter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå†™å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, db_manager: MongoDBConnectionManager, config: ImportConfig):
        self.db_manager = db_manager
        self.config = config
        self.collection = db_manager.collection
    
    def write_data(self, data_queue: queue.Queue, stats: PerformanceStats, worker_id: int):
        """å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°MongoDB"""
        logger.info(f"MongoDBå†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å¯åŠ¨")
        
        batch_buffer = []
        
        try:
            while True:
                try:
                    # èŽ·å–æ•°æ®å—
                    chunk = data_queue.get(timeout=30)
                    if chunk is None:  # ç»“æŸä¿¡å·
                        break
                    
                    # å¤„ç†æ•°æ®å—
                    for row in chunk:
                        # æž„å»ºMongoDBæ–‡æ¡£
                        doc = {
                            'product_id': row['id'],
                            'parameter_key': row['key'],
                            'parameter_value': str(row.get('value', '')),
                            'created_at': datetime.now(),
                            'updated_at': datetime.now()
                        }
                        
                        # ä½¿ç”¨upsertæ“ä½œ - ä¿®å¤created_atå†²çª
                        operation = UpdateOne(
                            {
                                'product_id': doc['product_id'],
                                'parameter_key': doc['parameter_key']
                            },
                            {
                                '$set': {
                                    'product_id': doc['product_id'],
                                    'parameter_key': doc['parameter_key'],
                                    'parameter_value': doc['parameter_value'],
                                    'updated_at': datetime.now()
                                },
                                '$setOnInsert': {'created_at': datetime.now()}
                            },
                            upsert=True
                        )
                        
                        batch_buffer.append(operation)
                        
                        # è¾¾åˆ°æ‰¹é‡å¤§å°æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œå†™å…¥
                        if len(batch_buffer) >= self.config.db_batch_size:
                            try:
                                result = self.collection.bulk_write(batch_buffer, ordered=False)
                                stats.records_written += result.upserted_count + result.modified_count
                                batch_buffer.clear()
                                
                                logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å¤„ç† {stats.records_written:,} æ¡è®°å½•")
                                
                            except BulkWriteError as bwe:
                                logger.error(f"æ‰¹é‡å†™å…¥é”™è¯¯: {bwe.details}")
                                # ç»§ç»­å¤„ç†ï¼Œä¸ä¸­æ–­
                                stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer) - len(bwe.details.get('writeErrors', []))
                                batch_buffer.clear()
                    
                    data_queue.task_done()
                    
                except queue.Empty:
                    logger.warning(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} ç­‰å¾…æ•°æ®è¶…æ—¶")
                    continue
            
            # å¤„ç†å‰©ä½™æ•°æ®
            if batch_buffer:
                try:
                    result = self.collection.bulk_write(batch_buffer, ordered=False)
                    stats.records_written += result.upserted_count + result.modified_count
                    logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} æœ€ç»ˆå¤„ç† {len(batch_buffer)} æ¡è®°å½•")
                except BulkWriteError as bwe:
                    logger.error(f"æœ€ç»ˆæ‰¹é‡å†™å…¥é”™è¯¯: {bwe.details}")
                    stats.records_written += len(batch_buffer) - len(bwe.details.get('writeErrors', []))
        
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            raise
        
        finally:
            logger.info(f"å†™å…¥å™¨ {worker_id} å·²å…³é—­")


class PerformanceMonitor:
    """æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, stats: PerformanceStats, memory_monitor: MemoryMonitor, total_records: int):
        self.stats = stats
        self.memory_monitor = memory_monitor
        self.total_records = total_records
        self.last_check_time = time.time()
        self.last_records_count = 0
    
    def update_stats(self):
        """æ›´æ–°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        current_time = time.time()
        elapsed_total = current_time - self.stats.start_time.timestamp()
        elapsed_since_last = current_time - self.last_check_time
        
        # è®¡ç®—é€Ÿåº¦
        if elapsed_since_last > 0:
            records_diff = self.stats.records_written - self.last_records_count
            self.stats.current_speed = records_diff / elapsed_since_last
        
        if elapsed_total > 0:
            self.stats.avg_speed = self.stats.records_written / elapsed_total
        
        # è®¡ç®—ETA
        if self.stats.avg_speed > 0:
            remaining_records = self.total_records - self.stats.records_written
            remaining_seconds = remaining_records / self.stats.avg_speed
            self.stats.eta = datetime.now() + timedelta(seconds=remaining_seconds)
        
        # æ›´æ–°ç³»ç»Ÿèµ„æºä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å†µ
        self.stats.memory_usage_mb = self.memory_monitor.get_memory_usage()
        self.stats.cpu_usage = self.memory_monitor.get_cpu_usage()
        
        # æ›´æ–°æ£€æŸ¥ç‚¹
        self.last_check_time = current_time
        self.last_records_count = self.stats.records_written
    
    def print_stats(self):
        """æ‰“å°æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡"""
        self.update_stats()
        
        progress = (self.stats.records_written / self.total_records) * 100 if self.total_records > 0 else 0
        eta_str = self.stats.eta.strftime("%H:%M:%S") if self.stats.eta else "æœªçŸ¥"
        
        logger.info(f"""
æ€§èƒ½ç»Ÿè®¡:
  è¿›åº¦: {self.stats.records_written:,}/{self.total_records:,} ({progress:.1f}%)
  å½“å‰é€Ÿåº¦: {self.stats.current_speed:,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {self.stats.avg_speed:,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
  é¢„è®¡å®Œæˆ: {eta_str}
  å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨: {self.stats.memory_usage_mb:.1f} MB
  CPUä½¿ç”¨: {self.stats.cpu_usage:.1f}%
        """)


class HighPerformanceMongoDBImporter:
    """é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDB DoEEETæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self, data_dir: str, config: ImportConfig = None):
        self.data_dir = Path(data_dir)
        self.config = config or ImportConfig()
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»„ä»¶
        self.memory_monitor = MemoryMonitor(self.config.max_memory_gb)
        self.db_manager = MongoDBConnectionManager(self.config)
        
        # æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
        self.parameter_csv = self.data_dir / "parameter.csv"
        
        # éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶
        if not self.parameter_csv.exists():
            raise FileNotFoundError(f"å‚æ•°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {self.parameter_csv}")
        
        logger.info(f"é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ")
        logger.info(f"é…ç½®: {self.config}")
    
    def import_parameters(self) -> bool:
        """å¯¼å…¥å‚æ•°æ•°æ®"""
        logger.info("å¼€å§‹é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå‚æ•°æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥...")
        
        # æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®åº“è¿žæŽ¥
        if not self.db_manager.test_connection():
            logger.error("MongoDBè¿žæŽ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥")
            return False
        
        # åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•
        try:
            self.db_manager.create_indexes()
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•å¤±è´¥: {e}")
            return False
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»Ÿè®¡
        stats = PerformanceStats(start_time=datetime.now())
        
        # åˆ›å»ºCSVè¯»å–å™¨
        csv_reader = HighPerformanceCSVReader(str(self.parameter_csv), self.config)
        total_records = csv_reader.total_lines - 1  # å‡åŽ»æ ‡é¢˜è¡Œ
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ€§èƒ½ç›‘æŽ§å™¨
        monitor = PerformanceMonitor(stats, self.memory_monitor, total_records)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®é˜Ÿåˆ—
        data_queue = queue.Queue(maxsize=self.config.queue_max_size)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“å†™å…¥å™¨
        db_writer = HighPerformanceMongoDBWriter(self.db_manager, self.config)
        
        try:
            # å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± 
            with ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=self.config.reader_threads + self.config.writer_threads) as executor:
                # æäº¤è¯»å–ä»»åŠ¡
                read_future = executor.submit(csv_reader.read_chunks, data_queue, stats)
                
                # æäº¤å†™å…¥ä»»åŠ¡
                write_futures = []
                for i in range(self.config.writer_threads):
                    future = executor.submit(db_writer.write_data, data_queue, stats, i)
                    write_futures.append(future)
                
                # ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦
                monitor_thread = threading.Thread(
                    target=self._monitor_progress,
                    args=(monitor, stats, total_records),
                    daemon=True
                )
                monitor_thread.start()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…è¯»å–å®Œæˆ
                read_future.result()
                
                # ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰å†™å…¥å®Œæˆ
                for future in as_completed(write_futures):
                    try:
                        future.result()
                    except Exception as e:
                        logger.error(f"å†™å…¥çº¿ç¨‹å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
                        return False
            
            # æœ€ç»ˆç»Ÿè®¡
            elapsed = datetime.now() - stats.start_time
            logger.info(f"""
MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆ!
  æ€»è®°å½•æ•°: {stats.records_written:,}
  æ€»è€—æ—¶: {elapsed}
  å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦: {stats.records_written / elapsed.total_seconds():,.0f} è®°å½•/ç§’
            """)
            
            return True
            
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"å¯¼å…¥è¿‡ç¨‹å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            return False
    
    def _monitor_progress(self, monitor: PerformanceMonitor, stats: PerformanceStats, total_records: int):
        """ç›‘æŽ§è¿›åº¦çº¿ç¨‹"""
        while stats.records_written < total_records:
            time.sleep(10)  # æ¯10ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡
            monitor.print_stats()


def main():
    """ä¸»å‡½æ•°"""
    # æ•°æ®ç›®å½• - ä½¿ç”¨ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
    script_dir = Path(__file__).parent
    project_root = script_dir.parent.parent

            sys.exit(0)
        else:
            logger.error("é«˜æ€§èƒ½MongoDBå¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥!")

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"ç¨‹åºå¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
        sys.exit(1)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

@dataclass
